title: Rajaavin Thoattathil Lyrics Samar Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Rajaavin Thoattathil
Singer(s): K.G. Ranjith, Rita
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar
Movie: Samar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Other Song Lyrics
Azhago Azhagu
Poikkaal Kuthirai
Vellai Mayil
Rajaavin Thotathil
Oru Kannil Vegam

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Rajaavin Thoattathil Rojaa chedi
Rojavai raaja nee kattipudi
nee aadum aattathai vittupudi
naan aadum aatathil muthukuli

ethanai aatam undo..hey .nee aduda
athanai attam ellam..hey..poi thaanada
sithargal sonnadhellam ..hey.meithaanada
meiyile meiyayi vaithu..va kai vaiyada

Rendu kaalu horseu
nee vachi paaru race-u
enna venum kettu
nee sundi podu tose-u

Endha pakkam inbam
nee bettu katti paaru
andha pakkam thottu
nee thottu thottu
vetri kodikattu

Pai paiyaai unveetil
panam kottumey
thangathil poo pookkum
un thottamey
kai thatti nee sonnaal
kai kattumey
vinmeengal nee thottaal
kaikettumey

Suthudhu suthudhu boomi
ye unnai kettuthaan
sooriyan varuvdhellaam
ahh unnai paarkathaan
sokkudhu sokkudhu nenjam
hey ye nee paarkathaan

Sikkudhu sikkudhu kangal
ye naan paarkathaan
kallum mannum kooda
un pechai kettu vazhum
aanal inga vandhaa
en pechai ketka venum

Sandhosathukaaga nee
mannil vandha aalu
ennai konjam thottu
nee thottu thottu
muthap padi kattu

we cant stop play'n coz we grow old
we grow old coz we stop play'n
our whole life is a puzzle game,
is in ur life
it is in ur soul
it is in your mind
our heart is gaming on
lets game on lets game on
just play on, have fun
enjoy the game
lets game on... English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
